title: Track fault causing delays on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Fault cleared. We are progressively recovering the service.

[CCL]: Due to a track fault, additional 10 mins travelling time between #Promenade & #MarinaBay. Shuttle train service is available #Bayfront & #MarinaBay at Platform B. Passengers are advised to use DTL to continue their journey between #Bayfront and #Promenade
[CCL] UPDATE: Shuttle train service is available #Bayfront & #MarinaBay at Platform B. Passengers are advised to use DTL to continue their journey between #Bayfront and #Promenade.
[CCL] UPDATE: Additional 10mins train travel time from #Promenade to #MarinaBay. We are working to recover service.
